feed.subtitle: Here i will share content about tutorials, technologies and related stuff of blockchain and cryptography and finally hacking.

entry.title: How to Get Started
entry.content:
The jekyll-gitbook theme can be used just as other Jekyll themes.

Fork this repository and add your markdown posts to the _posts folder, then push to your own Github repository. No need to push generated HTML bundle.

Hello
entry.summary: The jekyll-gitbook theme can be used just as other Jekyll themes.
